description: The Dunes picnic area offers a picnic pavilion, washrooms and picnic tables. It is located near the beach and provides access to the bike trails.
This area is describes as "Lake Erie Sand Spit Savannah," a rare habitat that supports important species of plants and animals, including Prickly Pear Cactus and the Five-lined Skink.
Photo by R Schreyer, 7 July 1971, via Flickr, licensed under CC BY-ND 2.0.
